name: Wpintl
body:
## Career

We are currently looking for competent individuals of diverse technology backgrounds to join our company, a highly dynamic environment. So, if you are an engineer or a major in science, who is enthusiastic in how inventors conceive inventions by putting technologies into practice, then W&P would be a very interesting choice for you.

We work in small teams. Our staffs are satisfied with the way of they work. We are reputable for providing excellent service to our clients with proven results. We attract outstanding attorneys and staff because we provide interesting work, a supportive and collegial work environment, personal satisfaction and promising pathways for career growth.

What will your life at W&P be like? Join us and find out.
